Title: Jaina's Resolution
Description:
For too long, I have toiled to mend fences between Alliance and Horde. Time and time again, I've given the Horde the benefit of the doubt - and time and time again, they stab me in the back.

I refuse to be betrayed again! If the Horde intends to use the Kirin Tor as a weapon against the Alliance, then they have no place in Dalaran.

Come with me, $n.
ObjectivesText: Use the portal from Darnassus to Dalaran, then speak with Vereesa Windrunner on the other side.
RewardText:
I will instruct you from here on out.

Jaina will be going down into the city to enforce our new rules.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal from Darnassus to Dalaran
